Posts.Content: Momto3sons2 wrote: Feeling very worried. I am a 56 year old post menopausal woman. I've had fibrocystic breasts with tenderness for as long as I can remember. Though it did lessen with meno I feel like I've had soreness and "flare-ups" since meno but not positive. Historically my fibrocystic symptoms always worsened with caffeine and chocolate, which I have been pounding lately r/t stress. My question is, can post meno women have fibro cysts. Dr Google doesn't have much definitive info. I'm scheduled for a diagnostic mammo and sono on March 8 and like many the anticipatory anxiety stinks! Thanks for ur support â˜º Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Post menopause cyst?? Momto3sons2 Momto3sons2

Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2018 08:58PM Momto3sons2 wrote: I'm interested in talking with other postmenopausal women with painful fibrocystic changes. Anyone please??
